Everything you need to build, manage, and scale residual income streams

Transparent Distribution

Real-time visibility into value flows. Every transaction tracked, every split auditable, complete transparency for all stakeholders.

Enterprise Security

Bank-grade encryption, SOC 2 compliance, and multi-factor authentication protect every transaction and user identity.

Instant Settlements

Real-time payment processing with automated revenue sharing. Creators receive their earnings immediately, no delays.

Advanced Analytics

Comprehensive dashboards showing revenue trends, user engagement, conversion metrics, and predictive growth modeling.

Smart Contracts

Automated revenue splits and royalty distributions via blockchain-based smart contracts. No intermediaries, just code.

Global Reach

Multi-currency support, localized payment methods, and compliance with international financial regulations in 150+ countries.

Who Uses LivePay

Built for diverse creator economies and enterprise use cases

Content Creators

YouTubers, podcasters, and digital artists use LivePay to monetize content with subscription models, tips, and merchandise sales—all with automated residual splits.
